SELECT B.BNO, B.QUESTION_TYPE, M.NAME, B.BTITLE, B.WRITTEN_DATE, B.B_STATUS FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.BWRITER = M.MNO) WHERE BTYPE LIKE 'QUESTION' AND B.REF_BNO IS NULL ORDER BY 6 DESC ,1 DESC

select.if: SELECT B.BNO, B.QUESTION_TYPE,B.BCONTENT, M.NAME, B.BTITLE, B.WRITTEN_DATE, B.B_STATUS ,BB.BCONTENT ANSWER FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.BWRITER = M.MNO) JOIN BOARD BB ON(B.BNO = BB.REF_BNO) WHERE B.BTYPE LIKE 'QUESTION' AND B.BNO = #{bno}
SELECT B.BNO, B.QUESTION_TYPE,B.BCONTENT, M.NAME, B.BTITLE, B.WRITTEN_DATE, B.B_STATUS FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.BWRITER = M.MNO) WHERE B.BTYPE LIKE 'QUESTION' AND B.BNO = #{bno}

SELECT M.MNO, M.MID,M.NAME, M.NICK_NAME, TO_CHAR(M.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') ENROLL_DATE, M.M_STATUS, bc.broad_address, RCOU.REPORT, BCOU.BROCOUNT
SELECT M.MNO, M.MID,M.NAME, M.NICK_NAME, TO_CHAR(M.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') ENROLL_DATE, M.M_STATUS, bc.broad_address, RCOU.REPORT, BCOU.BROCOUNT, TO_NUMBER(BA.BAN_END-BA.BAN_DATE) BAN_DAY, ROUND(TO_NUMBER(BA.BAN_END-SYSDATE)) END_DAY
FROM MEMBER M JOIN BROAD_CENTER BC ON(M.MNO = BC.MNO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT MM.MNO ,COUNT(*) REPORT FROM MEMBER MM JOIN BOARD B ON(MM.MNO = B.REPORT_MNO) GROUP BY MM.MNO) RCOU ON(M.MNO = RCOU.MNO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT MMM.MID , COUNT(*) BROCOUNT FROM BROAD_CENTER BRC JOIN BROAD_HIS BH ON(BRC.BCNO = BH.BCNO) JOIN MEMBER MMM ON(MMM.MNO = BRC.MNO) GROUP BY MMM.MID) BCOU ON(M.MID = BCOU.MID)
LEFT JOIN BAN BA ON(M.MNO = BA.MNO)
WHERE M.MID LIKE #{mid}
AND BA.BA_STATUS LIKE 'Y'

mapper.select: SELECT B.BNO, B.BTITLE, B.REPORT_TYPE , M.MID WRITER ,MM.MID TARGET ,C.COU, B.WRITTEN_DATE, B.B_STATUS FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.BWRITER = M.MNO) JOIN MEMBER MM ON(B.REPORT_MNO = MM.MNO) JOIN (SELECT REPORT_MNO, COUNT(*)COU FROM BOARD GROUP BY REPORT_MNO) C ON(C.REPORT_MNO = B.REPORT_MNO) WHERE BTYPE LIKE 'SREPORT' ORDER BY 8,7 DESC

SELECT B.BNO, B.BTITLE, B.REPORT_TYPE , M.MID WRITER ,MM.MID TARGET ,C.COU, B.WRITTEN_DATE, B.B_STATUS FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.BWRITER = M.MNO) JOIN MEMBER MM ON(B.REPORT_MNO = MM.MNO) JOIN (SELECT REPORT_MNO, COUNT(*)COU FROM BOARD GROUP BY REPORT_MNO) C ON(C.REPORT_MNO = B.REPORT_MNO) WHERE BTYPE LIKE 'MREPORT' ORDER BY 8,7 DESC
SELECT TO_NUMBER(BA.BAN_END-BA.BAN_DATE) BAN_DAY FROM BAN BA JOIN BOARD BO ON(BO.BNO = BA.BNO) WHERE BO.BNO = #{bno}

SELECT B.BNO, B.BTITLE , B.BCONTENT , B.WRITTEN_DATE , B.REPORT_TYPE, B.B_STATUS, M.MID WRITER ,MM.MID TARGET ,BA.BNO BAN_NO, MM.MNO FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.BWRITER = M.MNO) JOIN MEMBER MM ON(B.REPORT_MNO = MM.MNO) LEFT JOIN BAN BA ON(BA.BNO = B.BNO) WHERE B.BNO = #{bno}
